info.title: Kuali Rice ${pom.version} Release Notes

sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: This Release Notes documentation includes information on the list of changes between Rice ${previous.version} (released ${previous.reldate}) and Rice ${pom.version}. There are no upgrade instructions from Rice ${previous.version} to Rice ${pom.version} because should be a pure drop in replacement. There have been no database changes.
If you encounter any difficulty, please donâ€™t hesitate to contact the Rice team on our public collaboration mailing list at rice.collab@kuali.org
Kuali Rice ${pom.version} can be downloaded from the Rice website at .
There are three differient distributions of Rice available: source, binary and server. Please read the Installation Guide for more details on each of these distributions.
Documentation for this release can be found at at http://kuali.org/rice/docs/${pom.version}.

sect1.title: Bug Fix
sect1.para: KULRICE-3831: person inquiry displays too much information
KULRICE-3997: Make AnyCharacterValidationPattern to accept UTF-8
KULRICE-4083: ALLOW_ENROUTE_BLANKET_APPROVE_WITHOUT_APPROVAL_REQUEST_IND doesn't appear to work the way it's being described.
KULRICE-4256: new pages don't load at the top of the page
KULRICE-4385: Multiple delegates seem to be mixed up when viewing a person
KULRICE-4500: From and To dates note handled correctly on Routing Rules Maintenance document
KULRICE-4567: Make Responsibility Service not sensitive to miscoded role type services
KULRICE-4576: Looks like there is a bug in the KNS framework with nested collections and externalizable business objects.
KULRICE-4613: Cannot return a derived role as an assignee in the Role Document
KULRICE-4621: KFS-SYS user roles with blank qualifiers not appearing on person
KULRICE-4679: incorrect error message when I put in too long of a message on workflow annotations
KULRICE-4696: Parameter lookup reports all rows when only searching by Component
KULRICE-4699: WorkflowUtilityWebServiceImpl.hasRouteNode() does not consider parent documents
KULRICE-4768: creating a new Person and then blanket approving returns the user to the rice portal rather than client portal (kc)
KULRICE-4771: Show/Hide buttons affect incorrect rows on Inquiry with multiple collections
KULRICE-4772: Sections on direct inquiries have blank gaps between sections
KULRICE-4782: forceUppercase and encrypted PK fields are not compatible - unable to perform inquiry
KULRICE-4785: Document Operation Screen's "Create Date" field doesn't have time component, so updating resets create date of document to 12:00
KULRICE-4796: MaintainableFieldDefinition's readOnlyAfterAdd flag is ignored in a specific scenario
KULRICE-4800: KSB attempting to deploy SOAP services multiple times
KULRICE-4801: IdentityManagementService deployed as Simple instead of JAX-WS service
KULRICE-4805: DocumentTypePermissionServiceImpl seems to build permission details incorrectly
KULRICE-4818: Unable to delete Delegation
KULRICE-4822: fix inconsistencies in person role maintenance
KULRICE-4831: IdentityManagementService jaxws annotations are incomplete
KULRICE-4832: Editable properties do not update when there is a validation error
KULRICE-4835: help.tag direct parameter access is outdated
KULRICE-4836: Some KIM DTO objects (mostly labeled in KIM as 'Info' objects) do not properly serialize when the service returning them is consumed over the bus
KULRICE-4837: KualiDecimal accepts multiple decimal parts
KULRICE-4840: UiDocumentServiceImpl::getMember should not call BO service to get Principals,groups, roles. Use kim services
KULRICE-4841: permission lookup returns inactive permissions
KULRICE-4842: iframeportlet height calculated wrong
KULRICE-4845: FieldOverrideForValueReplaceImpl does not implement the FieldOverride interface
KULRICE-4849: Looking up permissions by person not working for Permission and Responsibility screens
KULRICE-4852: Kim Role search returns roles for "member" (group and principals) that are inactive
KULRICE-4857: Role delgations can't be inactivated

KULRICE-4859: The "create new" button shows up on the permission look up screen and the responsibility look up screen even if the user does not have permissions to initiate a new maintenance document of that type
KULRICE-4885: Keystore loader may not be closing files properly
KULRICE-4890: Direct Inquiry on KIM Objects does not handle invalid inputs
KULRICE-4899: Cannot add member to role because qualifiers are not being checked for uniqueness
KULRICE-4903: Document Exit logic has to accomodate non-standard exits also
KULRICE-4953: KIM Person Document does not handle duplicate active group memberships correctly.
KULRICE-4955: Lookups on qualified groups are not working correctly
KULRICE-4960: Role document aborts when we try to edit a role that has a RadioControlDefinition

sect1.title: Improvement
sect1.para: KULRICE-4558: Group document: add text indicating a namespace must be chosen before group members can be added
KULRICE-4790: HideWebInfFilter inefficient
KULRICE-4833: add <c:otherwise> to htmlControlAttribute
KULRICE-4877: createproject.groovy still generates a project which does not compile successfully in Eclipse
KULRICE-4901: move to new ojb patch
KULRICE-4950: Fix impex tool so that it's not required to define import.torque.threads
KULRICE-4952: Review patch to improve usability for multiple value lookups

sect1.title: Task
sect1.para: KULRICE-4601: Query to KREW_RIA_DOCTYPE_MAP_T happening for each search result row
KULRICE-4806: Update the rice-site url in the main pom.xml file
KULRICE-4823: Country's "Alternate Postal CountryCode" has a max length of 2, but should be 3.
KULRICE-4846: Remove PDF work from Rice
KULRICE-4865: EmailStyleHelper needs a LOG.isDebugEnabled test before a LOG.debug statement that calls XmlHelper.jotNode
KULRICE-4924: Include source and javadoc tarballs with SNAPSHOTS and RELEASES
KULRICE-4957: Update surefire plugin due to memory leak
